item.title: Inside Kunsthalle
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: Yes, you can jump inside the Kunsthalle in Hamburg, like other people do too…
item.content:encoded: Yes, you can jump inside the Kunsthalle in Hamburg, like other people do too…

item.title: Chris Jump in Front of Art
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Chris and Melanie finally came over to visit me in Hamburg. Of course we had to visit the Kunsthalle, and of course we had to jump!
item.content:encoded: Chris and Melanie finally came over to visit me in Hamburg. Of course we had to visit the Kunsthalle, and of course we had to jump!

Jumping around near my hometown at the historical [qype id=”140884″] with my friends from Heidelberg.

item.title: N√ºrnberg – here we are (again)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Like last year I’m back in N√ºrnberg to visit Christoph and his Family again. This time I took Miranda with me and Christoph has his spanish friends around. We get a small citytour and enjoy the cold icy wintertime.
item.content:encoded: Like last year I’m back in N√ºrnberg to visit Christoph and his Family again. This time I took Miranda with me and Christoph has his spanish friends around. We get a small citytour and enjoy the cold icy wintertime.

item.title: Esa Christmas Party
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: On our Christmas party we convinced our flatmates after some bottles of wine to do a synchronous jump. And it worked out: What a timing, we are all in the air at the same time! Well, at least most of us – Eva üôÇ
item.content:encoded: On our Christmas party we convinced our flatmates after some bottles of wine to do a synchronous jump. And it worked out: What a timing, we are all in the air at the same time! Well, at least most of us – Eva

item.title: Last Cornwall Jumps
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: These were our last minutes in Cornwall, right before our 2 day lasting journey back home to Kaiserslautern. Maybe you might classify these pictures as outtakes, but please consider that they were shot using the self-timer. By the way Melanie, I think this is a good place to tell you: I love you for joining […]
item.content:encoded: These were our last minutes in Cornwall, right before our 2 day lasting journey back home to Kaiserslautern. Maybe you might classify these pictures as outtakes, but please consider that they were shot using the self-timer. By the way Melanie, I think this is a good place to tell you: I love you for joining me on so many crazy missions

item.title: Chris’ Land’s End Jump
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: As [qype id=”181653″] is such a fantastic place at the very west of Cornwall, we decided to dedicate a jumping series to each of us. Please notice Chris’ incredible style and remarkable height üôÇ
item.content:encoded: As [qype id=”181653″] is such a fantastic place at the very west of Cornwall, we decided to dedicate a jumping series to each of us. Please notice Chris’ incredible style and remarkable height

item.title: Berlin Berlin Berlin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Jeah, this is part of the documentation of our big reunion in Berlin, when our charming Spanish friends came over to visit Berlin. We spent there some days together and jumped at historical places, like the [qype id=33233]. Check also the wikipedia page.
item.content:encoded: Jeah, this is part of the documentation of our big reunion in Berlin, when our charming Spanish friends came over to visit Berlin. We spent there some days together and jumped at historical places, like the [qype id=33233]. Check also the wikipedia page.
